Jacobs emerged as Alabama’s No. 2 running back and was later selected as the Most Valuable Player in the SEC Championship Game for his tremendous efforts in the postseason. The Tulsa, Okla., native contributed in numerous ways as a junior, totaling 15 touchdowns (11 rushing, three receiving, one kickoff return) to rank eighth in the SEC while his 11 rushing scores tied for seventh in the league. Jacobs ranked second on the Tide in scoring with 90 points. … [Read more...] about Josh Jacobs reacts to Scott Cochran departing Alabama for UGA
